code: public static DescriptionBuilder builder() {     return new DescriptionBuilder(). }

comment:
/** * Adds a block of text with placeholders ("%s") that will be replaced with proper string representation of * given {@link InlineElement}. For example: * *

{@code text("This is a text with a link %s", link("https://somepage", "to here"))} * * @param format text with placeholders for elements * @param elements elements to be put in the text * @return description with added block of text */
code:
/** * Adds a block of text with placeholders ("%s") that will be replaced with proper string representation of * given {@link InlineElement}. For example: * *

{@code text("This is a text with a link %s", link("https://somepage", "to here"))} * * @param format text with placeholders for elements * @param elements elements to be put in the text * @return description with added block of text */ public DescriptionBuilder text(String format, InlineElement... elements) { blocks.add(TextElement.text(format, elements)). return this. }

comment: /**  * Creates a simple block of text.  *  * @param text a simple block of text  * @return block of text  */
code: /**  * Creates a simple block of text.  *  * @param text a simple block of text  * @return block of text  */ public DescriptionBuilder text(String text) {     blocks.add(TextElement.text(text)).     return this. }

comment: /**  * Block of description add.  *  * @param block block of description to add  * @return block of description  */
code: /**  * Block of description add.  *  * @param block block of description to add  * @return block of description  */ public DescriptionBuilder add(BlockElement block) {     blocks.add(block).     return this. }

comment: /**  * Creates a line break in the description.  */
code: /**  * Creates a line break in the description.  */ public DescriptionBuilder linebreak() {     blocks.add(LineBreakElement.linebreak()).     return this. }

comment: /**  * Adds a bulleted list to the description.  */
code: /**  * Adds a bulleted list to the description.  */ public DescriptionBuilder list(InlineElement... elements) {     blocks.add(ListElement.list(elements)).     return this. }
/**  * Creates description representation.  */ public Description build() {     return new Description(blocks). }
